title: OPKO's Bishop on FDA Approval Of Its Kidney Disease Drug(Audio)
itunes:title: OPKO's Bishop on FDA Approval Of Its Kidney Disease Drug(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Dr. Charles Bishop, CEO of OPKO Health Renal Division, to discuss the FDA’s approval of Rayaldee and the health issues surrounding chronic kidney disease
